channel.title: ~ Oraculum ~
channel.description:
[center][size=24pt]~ Oraculum ~[/size] [size=12pt]After seeing people using the same bases, adding the same stuff, and generally making a server that constantly requires heavy maintenance, I have decided to build a server from SCRATCH. And i don't mean, using a nearly blank source, I mean opening up JCreator, Eclipse, or whatever IDE you're using, and clicking "New Project" and starting from there. Therefore It will eliminate the need for retro-fitting different tutorials, and generally causing the server to be severely unstable.
Note: I will not have any pictures for the moment, My computer that has most of my server files on it, it's USB Interface died. So until i get that back(hopefully today), This will just be a development thread, without the pics.[/size][/center]
Progression:
[ul][li]Incorporated MySQL to Store & Load Server Information(Eliminating the need for Thousands of character files)[/li] [li]Efficient Package Structure[/li] [li]80% Completion of All F2P Quests[/li] [li]Decided to douche the server, and re structure following most java conventions[/li][/ul]
That's all I can remember for the moment. Hopefully I get my computer back today, so that i keep a more up-to-date progression monitor.
zyle1992 (A.K.A ~ Zymus ~)
Latest Update: Decided to douche the server, and re structure following most java conventions[br][br][size=1]Posted on: January 02, 2009, 09:15:52 pm[/size][hr]UPDATE: Revamping Server Structure to follow MOST coding Conventions

[center][size=24pt]~ Oraculum ~[/size]
[size=12pt]After seeing people using the same bases, adding the same stuff, and generally making a server that constantly requires heavy maintenance, I have decided to build a server from SCRATCH. And i don’t mean, using a nearly blank source, I mean opening up JCreator, Eclipse, or whatever IDE you’re using, and clicking “New Project” and starting from there. Therefore It will eliminate the need for retro-fitting different tutorials, and generally causing the server to be severely unstable.

Note: I will not have any pictures for the moment, My computer that has most of my server files on it, it’s USB Interface died. So until i get that back(hopefully today), This will just be a development thread, without the pics.[/size][/center]
